data.title: Sebastian Darke Prince of Fools Signed by Philip Caveney
data.meta_description: Sebastian Darke: Prince of Fools (a first printing signed by the author) by Philip Caveney and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.co.uk.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. Bob Lea (illustrator). First Edition. This is a Fine Copy of this Book in in a Near Fine Dust-Jacket which has NO chips or tears to the outer edges of the wrappe.Not price clipped and this copy has been SIGNED by the Author on the Title Page.The book has a Firm binding and there is no leaning or rolling to spine.This is a nice clean copy internally.8vo 377pp First Edition 1st Impression [2007]. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. 1st Edition. Sebastian Darke - Prince of Fools by Philip Caveney The Bodley Head 2007. First edition, first impression. Signed by the author on the title page. This book is in very good condition. The red boards are in very good condition with minor bumping to the spine. The gilt lettering on the spine is bright. The dust jacket is in very good condition with minor bumping to the spine edges and corners. There is some minor rubbing to the corners and the top of the spine. There is one 3mm closed tear to the top of the dust jacket. There is a bookseller's sticker on the front of the dust jacket stating 'Signed by the author at Waterstone's'. The pages are clean and the binding is tight. The pages a yellowed slightly with age. Signed by Author(s).

Hardback. Condition: Very Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Fine. First Edition. 1st Printing. The Book is very fine, square and tight. It is unmarked, with clean pages free of inscriptions or marks and has been signed by the author directly on to the title page. The pages show the normal very slight yellowing due to ageing. The Dust Jacket is very fine, unfaded, unclipped (£9.99) and free of rips, tears or marks. The front face carries a round self adhesive label stating 'Signed by the Author'. First Edition, 1st Printing - Signed by the Author. All our books are covered with a clear, removable, chemically inert, protective wrapper before being securely bubble wrapped and dispatched in strong corrugated cardboard mailers. Signed by Author.

Hardcover. Condition: New. Dust Jacket Condition: New. Bob Lea (illustrator). 1st Edition. This is a UK first hard cover printing of this title, published by Bodley Head in 2007. IT IS SIGNED BY THE AUTHOR AND ALSO ILLUSTRATED AND SIGNED BY THE ARTIST AND DATED 03/07, AND NUMBERED 3 OF 16 COPIES. The jacket is Very Fine and unclipped (£9.99). The book is Very Fine with straight spine, sharp corners and firm spine ends. The copyright page has the run of nos 1-10 present to confirm the first edition state. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: New. Dust Jacket Condition: New. Bob Lea (illustrator). 1st Edition. This is a UK first hard cover printing of this title, published by Bodley Head in 2007. IT IS SIGNED BY THE AUTHOR AND ALSO ILLUSTRATED AND SIGNED BY THE ARTIST AND DATED 03/07, AND NUMBERED 5 OF 16 COPIES. The jacket is Very Fine and unclipped (£9.99). The book is Very Fine with straight spine, sharp corners and firm spine ends. The copyright page has the run of nos 1-10 present to confirm the first edition state. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: New. Dust Jacket Condition: New. Bob Lea (illustrator). 1st Edition. This is a UK first hard cover printing of this title, published by Bodley Head in 2007. IT IS SIGNED BY THE AUTHOR AND ALSO ILLUSTRATED AND SIGNED BY THE ARTIST AND DATED 03/07, AND NUMBERED 13 OF 16 COPIES. The jacket is Very Fine and unclipped (£9.99). The book is Very Fine with straight spine, sharp corners and firm spine ends. The copyright page has the run of nos 1-10 present to confirm the first edition state. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: New. Dust Jacket Condition: New. First Edition. First British Edition, First Printing with full number line. Signed, without inscription, by author on the FULL title page. Unread As New book in As New dust jacket. All our books are bubble wrapped and shipped in a sturdy box with Delivery Confirmation. NO remainder mark, NO previous owner markings or inscriptions, NOT price clipped, NOT a Book Club Edition, NOT an Ex-Lib. Dust jacket covered in protective clear wrapper. Signed.

Hard Cover. Condition: As New. Dust Jacket Condition: As New. Lea, Bob (illustrator). First Edition. 1ST EDITION, 1ST PRINT, SIGNED BY AUTHOR & SIGNED & DOODLED/DATED BY ILLUSTRATOR. Only 16 of these, this is Number 7. Features the eponymous hero (a would-be jester desperate to make money, let alone people laugh); a shaggy, sarcastic 'buffalope' called Max who can talk (and does, at great length); and Cornelius, an unlikely pint-size warrior who could give Zorro a run for his money. This funny story is aimed at the children aged 9+. Signed by Author.
